com.versant.connector.jvi.nonmanaged
Class ConnectionConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.connector.jvi.nonmanaged.ConnectionConfig

public class ConnectionConfig
extends java.lang.Object

ConnectionConfig provides accessors and mutators for setting different properties.
